rules_text:
When Mike enters, choose one–
• [i]Beckon Customers[/i] – Create a 1/1 black and red Youkai creature token.
• [i]Beckon Wealth[/i] – If an opponent controls more lands than you, create a Treasure token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
artist: 瞑丸 イヌチヨ/Meimaru Inuchiyo
notes:
Treasure mode a pie issue for white. catchup version works for some people, but Emily makes good point that this can be played for the token and then a land played after, still making it net ramp. Needs to produce artifact token for slot role. Food is sideways option for ludonarrative but pie functions well enough. Grapple suggests possible route of making new bespoke token, in particular suggests something evoking OTJ Mercenaries. Viable but I would want it to be made a bigger deal than just Mike's, flavoring could be tricky but it's worth investigating.
